Articles.Content: ok so as some of you may know (who have played skyrim for console trust me it's relevant) Bethesda provides a system by which you may mod your game for console and pc. so you may be asking how is this relevant to ksp2? well my question to both the devs and the community is if the ability to mod your game will be available for console players or at least a collection of some of the best and most popular mods ported for console ? if this is not already in the works dear developers please consider it as a feature recommendation possibly to be released after main game launch.
